== SIP Performance Metrics _(org.sipana.server.sip.performance)_ ==

The SIP Performance Metrics used in the Sipana project is based on the Daryl Malas Internet Draft [http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-pmol-sip-perf-metrics SIP End-to-End Performance Metrics].

All classes involved with performance metrics are in the *org.sipana.server.sip.performance* Java package .
